emails.subject: User email address enumeration vulnerability on jupiter.err.ee
emails.bodyHtml: Hello, During our research on user account enumeration flaws on Estonian online services, we found that your website is vulnerable to the exposure of registered user email addresses. The vulnerability report is attached. We would appreciate it if you could confirm receipt of this email to prevent us from reaching out to you through other channels. Best regards, Gregor Eesmaa Computer Science MSc student University of Tartu, Institute of Computer Science

emails.subject: User email address enumeration vulnerability on jupiter.err.ee

emails.subject: Auto: User email address enumeration vulnerability on jupiter.err.ee
emails.bodyHtml: Täname, et olete saatnud kirja Eesti Rahvusringhäälingule! Teabenõuetele vastame 5 tööpäeva jooksul ning märgukirjadele ja selgitustaotlustele hiljemalt 15 kalendripäeva jooksul. Lugupidamisega Eesti Rahvusringhääling F. R. Kreutzwaldi 14 15029 Tallinn Telefon: 628 4100 err@err.ee err.ee

emails.subject: IKÜM taotlus seoses isikuandmete töötlemisega teenuses jupiter.err.ee / GDPR Request Regarding Processing of Personal Data on jupiter.err.ee
emails.bodyHtml: Lugupeetud jupiter.err.ee vastutav andmetöötleja Pöördun, et edastada ametlikult mure isikuandmete kaitse üldmääruse (IKÜM) alusel seoses minu isikuandmete töötlemisega teenuses jupiter.err.ee, mida pean ebaseaduslikuks ning mis võib viia nende avaldamiseni selleks volitamata isikutele ilma selge õigusliku aluseta. Manuses on ametlik taotlus, milles teostan oma õigusi IKÜM artiklite 15, 18 ja 21 alusel. Palun selle läbivaatust ja vastavate meetmete võtmist ajaraamis, mis on sätestatud IKÜM artiklis 12(3) (üks kuu taotluse saamisest). Palun teavitage taotluse kättesaamisest. Lugupidamisega Gregor Eesmaa -- Dear Data Controller of jupiter.err.ee, I am contacting you to formally raise concerns under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) regarding what I believe to be the unlawful processing of my personal data by jupiter.err.ee, potentially leading to its disclosure to unauthorised parties without a clear legal basis. Please find attached a formal application exercising my rights under Articles 15, 18, and 21 of the GDPR. I request that you review and act upon it accordingly, within the timeframe established by Article 12(3) of the GDPR (one month from receipt). Please confirm receipt of this request. Kind regards, Gregor Eesmaa

emails.subject: Re: IKÜM taotlus seoses isikuandmete töötlemisega teenuses jupiter.err.ee / GDPR Request Regarding Processing of Personal Data on jupiter.err.ee
emails.bodyHtml:
Saadan igaks juhuks ka eraldi taotluse ja aruande PDFid, mis asusid eelmise meili manuses digiallkirjastatud konteineris.

Lugupidamisega
Gregor Eesmaa

--

Just in case, providing also the request and the report PDF files, that were in the digitally signed container attached to the previous email.

Kind regards,
Gregor Eesmaa
